explanation: He who wills goodness and mercy for all His creatures
benefit: Reciting it 100 times after every obligatory prayer will enhance memory and awareness. The reciter will feel the burden vanishing away from his heart.

explanation: He who acts with extreme kindness
benefit: Reciting it after Fajr prayer 100 times will keep the person safe from all tribulation. Moreover, he will find everyone benevolent towards him.

explanation: The Sovereign Lord, The One with the complete Dominion, the One Whose Dominion is clear from imperfection
benefit: Recitation of this name after Fajr prayer will make a person become rich.

explanation: The One who is pure from any imperfection and clear from children and adversaries
benefit: Agitation never comes close if someone recites it 100 times every day.

explanation: The One who is free from every imperfection.
benefit: The sick will regain his health if this is recited to him 160 times. It also keeps the frequent reciter, of this name, safe from all types of tribulations.

explanation: The One who witnessed for Himself that no one is God but Him. And He witnessed for His believers that they are truthful in their belief that no one is God but Him
benefit: Reciting it 631 times will keep you safe from anguish.

explanation: The One who witnesses the saying and deeds of His creatures
benefit: This purifies the soul of a person, if it is recited 100 times after taking a bath and offering two rakaats of prayer.

explanation: The Strong, The Defeater who is not defeated
benefit: Recitation of this name 41 times after Fajr prayer will make the person independent from others and will earn respect.

explanation: The One that nothing happens in His Dominion except that which He willed
benefit: Whoever recites this name several times will not be forced to do anything. He will be safe from cruelty and hardship.

explanation: The One who is clear from the attributes of the creatures and from resembling them.
benefit: The one who recites this name frequently will earn respect and gain success.

explanation: The One who brings everything from non-existence to existence
benefit: Allah will assign an angel to guide the person righteously if he recites this name 100 times continuously for a prescribed limit of 7 days.

explanation: The Maker, The Creator who has the Power to turn the entities.
benefit: This name only signifies that Allah created all things in proportion.

explanation: The One who forms His creatures in different pictures.
benefit: Recite this name 21 times and do a Damm on water. Continue this for 7 consecutive days. Use the water for breaking the fast. Insha’Allah, the women will soon be blessed with a child.

explanation: The Forgiver, The One who forgives the sins of His slaves time and time again.
benefit: Sins of a person will be forgiven if it is recited frequently.

explanation: The Dominant, The One who has the perfect Power and is not unable over anything.
benefit: This name will provide the person with inner peace and will lead the person to the correct place.

explanation: The One who is Generous in giving plenty without any return. He is everything that benefits whether Halal or Haram.
benefit: Reciting it frequently will remove poverty. Reciting it 40 times in the last Sajadah of Chasht prayer will relieve the person from starvation.

explanation: The Sustainer, The Provider.
benefit: The person will be provided with livelihood by reciting this name.

explanation: The Opener, The Reliever, The Judge, The One who opens for His slaves the closed worldly and religious matters.
benefit: The reciter of this name will be given success and victory in every aspect of his life.

explanation: The Knowledgeable; The One nothing is absent from His knowledge
benefit: The heart of reciter will be enlightened with the light of Nur.

explanation: The Constrictor, The Withholder, The One who constricts the sustenance by His wisdom and expands and widens it with His Generosity and Mercy.
benefit: This finishes poverty from the house if it is written, and eaten on 4 pieces of food till 40 days.

explanation: The Englarger, The One who constricts the sustenance by His wisdom and expands and widens it with His Generosity and Mercy.
benefit: Repeating this name 10 times after Chasht prayer and rubbing hands with face will no longer be dependent upon others.

explanation: The Abaser, The One who lowers whoever He willed by His Destruction and raises whoever He willed by His Endowment.
benefit: Allah will fulfill the need of the person who recites it 500 times. It also acts as a guard from all enemies if a group of people sit in the gathering on the fourth day of fasting and recite this name 70 times each.

explanation: The Exalter, The Elevator, The One who lowers whoever He willed by His Destruction and raises whoever He willed by His Endowment.
benefit: The one who recites this name 101 times in day and night will get wealthier and will be highly regarded in merit.

explanation: He gives esteem to whoever He willed, hence there is no one to degrade Him; And He degrades whoever He willed, hence there is no one to give Him esteem.
benefit: Reciting this name 140 times after Maghrib prayer either on Monday or on Friday, Allah will make him majestic in the eyes of other people.

explanation: The Dishonourer, The Humiliator, He gives esteem to whoever He willed, hence there is no one to degrade Him; And He degrades whoever He willed, hence there is no one to give Him esteem.
benefit: Reciting this name 75 times will protect the person from those who wish to harm him.

explanation: The Hearer, The One who Hears all things that are heard by His Eternal Hearing without an ear, instrument or organ.
benefit: Allah will fulfill the desire of a person who recites this name 500, 100 or 50 times on Thursday after Chasht prayer.

explanation: The All-Noticing, The One who Sees all things that are seen by His Eternal Seeing without a pupil or any other instrument.
benefit: For the enlightenment of heart and soul, recite this name 100 times after Jummah prayer.

explanation: The Judge, He is the Ruler and His judgment is His Word.
benefit: Secrets will be revealed to the person who recites this name frequently at night.

explanation: The Just, The One who is entitled to do what He does.
benefit: People will obey you if you will write this name on a piece of bread on Friday.

explanation: The Subtle One, The Gracious, The One who is kind to His slaves and endows upon them.
benefit: To make your affairs get settled accordingly to your will, recite this name 133 times daily.

explanation: The One who knows the truth of things.
benefit: Reciting this name regularly will make a person a righteous man who is induxled in wrong things.

explanation: The Forebearing, The One who delays the punishment for those who deserve it and then He might forgive them.
benefit: Write this name on a piece of paper and wash it with water. Use that water for sprinkling things. This will keep the things safe from all types of damages.

explanation: The Great One, The Mighty, The One deserving the attributes of Exaltment, Glory, Extolement, and Purity from all imperfection.
benefit: To earn respect and honor, recite this name several times.

explanation: The All-Forgiving, The Forgiving, The One who forgives a lot.
benefit: This name works as a cure for headache and fever.

explanation: The Grateful, The Appreciative, The One who gives a lot of reward for a little obedience.
benefit: The person will be relieved from all the suffering if he recites this name 41 times daily.

explanation: The Most High, The One who is clear from the attributes of the creatures.
benefit: The one who keeps this name written on a piece of paper will achieve a high rank and success in all his work.

explanation: The Most Great, The Great, The One who is greater than everything in status.
benefit: The reciter of this name 100 times daily will be esteemed by everyone.

explanation: The Preserver, The Protector, The One who protects whatever and whoever He willed to protect.
benefit: Recite this name and do a Damm on water. Give the water to the ill mannered child. He will become obedient.

explanation: The Maintainer, The Guardian, The Feeder, The One who has the Power.
benefit: Reciting it many times will keep him safe from problems and difficulties.

explanation: The Reckoner, The One who gives the satisfaction.
benefit: The one who recites this name 7 times and do a Damm on himself, his property and family will come under the custody of Allah.

explanation: The Sublime One, The Beneficent, The One who is attributed with greatness of Power and Glory of status.
benefit: Repeating this name frequently will help a person attain respect and honor.

explanation: The Generous One, The Gracious, The One who is attributed with greatness of Power and Glory of status.
benefit: To earn a lot of respect in this world and Hereafter, recite this name many times before going to sleep.

explanation: The Watcher, The One that nothing is absent from Him. Hence it’s meaning is related to the attribute of Knowledge.
benefit: Recite this name seven times and do a Damm on yourself or your family. This will ensure the safety under Allah’s protection.

explanation: The Responsive, The Hearkener, The One who answers the one in need if he asks Him and rescues the yearner if he calls upon Him.
benefit: If you want an answer to any of your appeal, then you will get it if you recite this name frequently.

explanation: The Vast, The All-Embracing, The Knowledgeable.
benefit: Allah opens the doors of income if someone recites this name many times. His difficulties in earning be vanished.

explanation: The Wise, The Judge of Judges, The One who is correct in His doings.
benefit: This name, when recited, removes difficulties of the work.

explanation: The One who loves His believing slaves and His believing slaves love Him. His love to His slaves is His Will to be merciful to them and praise them
benefit: This name helps in resolving a disagreement between two people if one gives the other person food after reciting this name 1000 times in his food.

explanation: The Most Glorious One, The One who is with perfect Power, High Status, Compassion, Generosity and Kindness.
benefit: This name bestows a person with glory.

explanation: The Resurrector, The Raiser (from death), The One who resurrects His slaves after death for reward and/or punishment.
benefit: This name makes a person God fearing and therefore, it leads him to the righteous path.

explanation: The Witness, The One who nothing is absent from Him.
benefit: Recite this name 21 times with the hand placed on the head of the disobedient person. Insha’Allah, he will become obedient.

explanation: The Truth, The True, The One who truly exists.
benefit: If you lost something, then recite this name.

explanation: The Trustee, The One who gives the satisfaction and is relied upon.
benefit: Allah will protect that person from drowning or burning in fire if he recites this name frequently.

explanation: The Most Strong, The Strong, The One with the complete Power
benefit: This keeps a person safe from the harm of the enemy if he is unable to defeat the enemy.

explanation: The One with extreme Power which is un-interrupted and He does not get tired.
benefit: This helps a person to get rid of all types of troubles.

explanation: The Protecting Friend, The Supporter.
benefit: Reciting this name makes the person closer to Allah.

explanation: The Praiseworthy, The praised One who deserves to be praised.
benefit: The one who recites this name will be praised and loved.

explanation: The Counter, The Reckoner, The One who the count of things are known to him.
benefit: This name provides ease to the person if he is afraid of being questioned on the Day of Resurrection.

explanation: The One who started the human being. That is, He created him.
benefit: A pregnant woman will be safe from danger while aborting if she repeats this name several times.

explanation: The Reproducer, The One who brings back the creatures after death
benefit: Reciting this name 70 times will bring the person who has left home within 7 days, safe and secure.

explanation: The Restorer, The Giver of Life, The One who took out a living human from semen that does not have a soul. He gives life by giving the souls back to the worn out bodies on the resurrection day and He makes the hearts alive by the light of knowledge.
benefit: This name reduces the burden of a person if recited 7 times every day.

explanation: The Creator of Death, The Destroyer, The One who renders the living dead.
benefit: This name destroys the enemy completely.

explanation: The Alive, The One attributed with a life that is unlike our life and is not that of a combination of soul, flesh or blood.
benefit: The reciter of this name will have a long life.

explanation: The One who remains and does not end.
benefit: The one repeats this name will remain active.

explanation: The Perceiver, The Finder, The Rich who is never poor. Al-Wajd is Richness.
benefit: This name increases the richness of heart.

explanation: The Glorious, He who is Most Glorious.
benefit: This name enlightens the heart of its reciter.

explanation: The Unique, The One, The One without a partner
benefit: Reciting this name 1000 times in silence alone will vanish the fear from the heart.

explanation: The One
benefit: Secrets will be revealed to the person who recites this name 1000 times.

explanation: The Eternal, The Independent, The Master who is relied upon in matters and reverted to in ones needs.
benefit: Allah will fulfill all the needs of the person who recites this name many times.

explanation: The Able, The Capable, The One attributed with Power.
benefit: Allah fulfills all the desires of the person who recites this name often.

explanation: The Powerful, The Dominant, The One with the perfect Power that nothing is withheld from Him.
benefit: The reciter will become aware of the truth.

explanation: The Expediter, The Promoter, The One who puts things in their right places. He makes ahead what He wills and delays what He wills.
benefit: Reciting this name on the battlefield removes all the fear and keeps the person safe from harm.

explanation: The Delayer, the Retarder, The One who puts things in their right places. He makes ahead what He wills and delays what He wills.
benefit: Reciting this name in the heart for 100 times enriches the person’s heart with the love of Allah. All his world desires will be removed as no other love will ever replace his heart.

explanation: The First, The One whose Existence is without a beginning.
benefit: If recited 40 times for 40 days, it will give a child to a family who is not blessed with one. Moreover, a traveler will reach home safe and sound if he recites this name 1000 times on Friday.

explanation: The Last, The One whose Existence is without an end.
benefit: The reciter of this name will have a good life and a good death.

explanation: The Manifest, The One that nothing is above Him and nothing is underneath Him, hence He exists without a place. He, The Exalted, His Existence is obvious by proofs and He is clear from the delusions of attributes of bodies.
benefit: The reciter’s heart will be enlightened with Noor (the divine light) if this name is recited 15 times after the Jummah prayer on Friday.

explanation: The Hidden, The One that nothing is above Him and nothing is underneath Him, hence He exists without a place. He, The Exalted, His Existence is obvious by proofs and He is clear from the delusions of attributes of bodies.
benefit: With the recitation of this name for only three times every day, he will be able to know the truth in all things.

explanation: The Governor, The One who owns things and manages them.
benefit: This name keeps the house safe from all dangers.

explanation: The Most Exalted, The High Exalted, The One who is clear from the attributes of the creation.
benefit: Whosoever recites this name will become closer to Allah.

explanation: The Source of All Goodness, The Righteous, The One who is kind to His creatures, who covered them with His sustenance and specified whoever He willed among them by His support, protection, and special mercy.
benefit: This name will make the future of the child of reciter free from misfortune.

explanation: The Relenting, The One who grants repentance to whoever He willed among His creatures and accepts his repentance.
benefit: Supplications are accepted if this name is recited frequently.

explanation: The Avenger, The One who victoriously prevails over His enemies and punishes them for their sins. It may mean the One who destroys them.
benefit: This helps gain victory against enemies.

explanation: The Forgiver, The One with wide forgiveness.
benefit: This name helps a person in the forgiveness of all his sins.

explanation: The Compassionate, The One with extreme Mercy. The Mercy of Allah is His will to endow upon whoever He willed among His creatures.
benefit: Allah blesses the one who recites this name more often.

explanation: The One who controls the Dominion and gives dominion to whoever He willed.
benefit: This name gives respect to its reciter among people.

meaning: The Possessor of Majesty and Honour
explanation: The Lord of Majesty and Bounty, The One who deserves to be Exalted and not denied.
benefit: This name removes poverty and makes a person rich.

explanation: The Equitable, The One who is Just in His judgment.
benefit: This name provides protection from the harm of a devil.

explanation: The Gatherer, The One who gathers the creatures on a day that there is no doubt about, that is the Day of Judgment.
benefit: With the power and glory of this name, you will be able to find lost things.

explanation: The One who does not need the creation.
benefit: Reciting this name 70 times will make a person free from all needs.

explanation: The Enricher, The One who satisfies the necessities of the creatures.
benefit: Reciting this name 1000 times for ten consecutive Fridays will make a person become self sufficient.

explanation: The Withholder.
benefit: Recitation of this name 20 times at bedtime provides a happy family life.

explanation: The One who makes harm reach to whoever He willed and benefit to whoever He willed.
benefit: This name helps a person in gaining peace if it is read 20 times on Friday nights.

explanation: The Propitious, The One who makes harm reach to whoever He willed and benefit to whoever He willed.
benefit: This name gives success on every good act if it is started with the recitation of this name for 41 times.

explanation: The Light, The One who guides.
benefit: This name enlightens the inside of the person.

explanation: The Guide, The One whom with His Guidance His believers were guided, and with His Guidance the living beings have been guided to what is beneficial for them and protected from what is harmful to them.
benefit: 1100 times of the recitation of this name makes a person fulfill his needs.

explanation: The Incomparable, The One who created the creation and formed it without any preceding example.
benefit: To gain relief from any type of distress, a person should recite this name 70,000 times.

explanation: The Everlasting, The One that the state of non-existence is impossible for Him.
benefit: To ensure that all your good deeds are accepted, recite this name 100 times on every Friday night.

explanation: The Heir, The One whose Existence remains.
benefit: A person will remain safe from sorrow and distress if he recites this name 100 times after the sunrise.

meaning: The Guide to Path of Rectitude
explanation: The Guide to the Right Path, The One who guides.
benefit: To complete a task you are unable to do, recite this name 1000 times between Maghrib and Isha prayer.

explanation: The Patient, The One who does not quickly punish the sinners.
benefit: The person will be rescued from his difficulty if he recites this name 3000 times.
